survey_name: Public Library Digital Resource Usage Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how patrons utilize digital resources provided by public libraries, including e-books, online databases, and virtual programs, to improve service offerings and user experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you access digital resources (e-books, audiobooks, databases, etc.) from your public library?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout for clarity. Ensure options cover all potential usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you access digital resources (e-books, audiobooks, databases, etc.) from your public library?

questions.question_text: Which types of digital resources do you use most often? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with text input to capture unlisted resources.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which types of digital resources do you use most often? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: What challenges, if any, have you faced when using the library's digital resources?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Open-text field to allow detailed feedback. Use a text area box for longer responses.

script.question_text: What challenges, if any, have you faced when using the library's digital resources?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of digital resources available through your public library?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Display as a radio button list.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of digital resources available through your public library?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: What additional digital resources or services would you like your public library to offer?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather innovative ideas. Ensure mobile-responsive design for text input.

script.question_text: What additional digital resources or services would you like your public library to offer?
